EmailTemplate.subject: Drop-in F-16 upgrades by Honeywell and Aero Precision
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Improve Operation and Reliability with Honeywell Common Color Multi-Function Display (CCMFD) and Advanced Central Air Data Computer (ACADC) Honeywell is proud to be a significant content provider on the F-16 Fighting Falcon multi-role fighter. This combat-proven platform serves as the workhorse of Lockheed Martin’s fighter fleet. From advanced avionics to mechanical systems, Honeywell solutions are proven to be highly reliable and capable, providing the power to protect and the technology to perform in any airspace environment. Today, Honeywell has partner with Aero Precision to bring operators solutions like the CCMDF that enable operators to relay on aging aircraft that can deliver performance. Plus, with Aero Precision, you can expect efficiency and effectiveness on your order. As a leading provider for the F-16, Aero Precision prides itself in being flexible, reliable and committed to quality. Click on the link below to request more information about these upgrades or call Aero Precision at (925) 380-2384 <tel:(925) 380-2384> to speak to a dedicated representative.
